item.title: Pokemon TCG Pocket Has Revealed Their Space-Time Smackdown Expansion
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/pokemon-tcg-pocket-space-time-smackdown-expansion-reveal/

Pokemon TCG Pocket has just announced its upcoming expansion, Space-Time Smackdown, arriving on January 29, 2025. Additionally, the Pokemon TCG Pocket Trade feature will arrive on January 28. 

Pokemon TCG Pocket’s Space-Time Smackdown will feature the legendary Pokemon Dialga and Palkia. The expansion will introduce over 140 cards from the Sinnoh region, and the collection will include new ex, trainers, and immersive cards. The Pokemon TCG Pocket’s Space-Time Smackdown trailer featured Sinnoh region starters, Turtwig, Chimchar, and Piplup, along with other cards like Pachirisu ex, Leafeon, Honchkrow, Cynthia, Gible, Cresselia, Dialga and Palkia. 

Pokemon TCG Pocket Trade Feature Arrives January 28 

The Space-Time Smackdown trailer also confirmed that the highly anticipated Trade feature is arriving on Wednesday, January 28. However, there are some caveats to trading, such as only being able to trade between friends, having limitations to rarity and more you can read in our previous report. 

In other news, Pokemon TCG Pocket offers rewards through select Happy Meals at McDonalds. Also, check out the complete Mythical Island card list. What are your thoughts on the Pokemon TCG Pocket Space-Time Smackdown expansion? Let us know in the comments below or our community forum!

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Final Fantasy 7 Remake developers already completing Part 3’s story. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
